system.effect: Slime filled components rarely found on Alien Derelicts. Is capable of healing Injury. When placed inside, Lightly-Damaged patients automatically pass one Extend care Test per hour, while Heavily/Critically damaged patients auto-pass one every day. After healing, for the next session, when spending a fate point, on a d10 roll of 1 or 2, it has no effect.
